sentences.sentence: The value of China, Britain and Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015; while Dutch keep stable between 2010 and 2015.
The value of China and Dutch is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015.

sentences.sentence: The value of China, Britain and Japan increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2015; while Dutch keep stable between 2010 and 2015.
The value of China and Dutch is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013, 2014 and 2015.
